page.title: 11COBHAM SURREY - LEISURE
page.content: 40 people were interviewed. Various leisure facilities were suggested. 10 people wanted a swimming pool, 6 wanted a leisure centre, 2 wanted a dance hall for the young, 2 wanted more sports facilities. Other suggestions were: a pavilion, children's playground, place to fish, coffee bar and tennis court. They were then asked the changes they would like to see in Cobham. 11 people said they liked it as it is, 6 were not happy with the shops in various ways, 3 wanted more leisure facilities, 4 didn't like the traffic, 1 wanted more spent on tidiness, 2 wanted various services, 1 wanted fewer buildings, 1 did not like the idea of Pains Hill Park and 1 wanted more for young people.
